object: Georgia (1996) Graduate assistant | SMU (1997-1999) Wide receivers coach | LSU (2000-2002) Tight ends coach | LSU (2003-2004) Assistant head coach & running backs coach | Miami Dolphins (2005-2006) Tight ends coach | Louisiana Tech (2007-2009) Head coach | Tennessee (2010-2012) Head coach | Dallas Cowboys (2013-2017) Wide receivers coach | Missouri (2018-2019) Offensive coordinator & quarterbacks coach | New York Giants (2020) Senior offensive assistant | New York Giants (2021) Tight ends coach | Alabama (2022-present) Senior offensive analyst
